comment: The area of a circle of radius ` R ` is ` _pi x. R ^ 2 ` . This is Metamath 100 proof #9. (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 31-Aug-2017.) (Revised by Brendan Leahy, 22-Sep-2017.) (Revised by Brendan Leahy, 11-Jul-2018.)
